Around 19 February 2025 (as reported), in Atenango del Rio, Guerrero, two people were killed and their bodies were found with signs of torture, blindfolded with their hands and feet tied up in front of the municipal palace. A message signed by a criminal group was also found. The message accused the victims of robbery and threatened that the same would happen to those who robbed businesses, houses or cows in the area. 2 fatalities.
On 19 February 2025, in San Carlos, Baja California, a man and a boy abducted a girl. The authorities arrested the perpetrators and released the victim hours later.
Around 19 February 2025 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinoaloa, a person was killed and the body was found wrapped in netting in the intersection of Musala boulevard and Tachichilte street, in Isla Musala. A cardboard with an unspecified message was stabbed into the body with a knife. 1 fatality.
On 19 February 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed individuals entered a house and tried to kidnap a young boy in Colonia Tierra Blanca. The father intervened and was shot and killed. The young man was injured. Later, several armed individuals members of Los Chapitos were arrested as they are suspected to be responsible for the killing. 1 fatality.
Around 18 February 2025 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a man was killed and his decapitated head was found at a bus stop in Colonia Hipodromo, along with a threatening message that accused two state police officers of stealing 200 kgs. of cocaine. A perpetrator was arrested later the same day in Galerias Square. 1 fatality.
On 18 February 2025, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, two individuals on a motorcycle arrived at a sound equipment store in the intersection of Navarra and Vizcaya streets, in Colonia Vista Hermosa, and shot at people who were inside, killing three men and injuring a woman. The owner and his underage son were among the victims. Also in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, two men on a motorcycle arrived at a vehicle paint workshop in the intersection of Doctor Juan Bautista Orozco street and Guanajuato boulevard, in Colonia Las Trojes, and one of them entered the store and shot and injured the owner. 3 fatalities, 2 injured.
Around 18 February 2025 (as reported), in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, a person (suspectedly a man) was killed and the body was found inside a cardboard box wrapped in plastic bags on Monacita street, in Colonia Valle de la Joya. 1 fatality.
Around 18 February 2025 (as reported), in La Esperanza, Jalisco, eight people were killed and their dismembered bodies were found inside a dozen plastic bags on Teocaltiche-Villa Hidalgo road. Next to the bodies, there was a threatening message against a local leader of the Sinaloa Cartel. The victims were off-duty municipal police officers of Teocaltiche who disappeared in San Juan de los Lagos when they were travelling to Guadalajara to pass a confidence control (off-duty). Some of them suspectedly had links to the Sinaloa Cartel, however this was not confirmed. Their vehicle was found on km. 66+400 of the road to Zapotlanejo, in the municipality of Valle de Guadalupe. 8 fatalities.
On 18 February 2025, in Tonala, Jalisco, unidentified individuals tied the hands of a man and set him on fire. The victim was found alive in a sewage canal on Marcos Arana Cervantes, in Colonia Santa Paula. 1 injured.
Around 18 February 2025 (as reported), in Almoloya de Juarez, Mexico, two men on a motorcycle approached an off-duty prison guard who had just finished his shift at N.1 Federal Center for Social Readaptation Altiplano and shot and injured him from a short distance. 1 injured.
Around 18 February 2025 (as reported), in Tultitlan de Mariano Escobedo, Mexico, a person was killed and the body was found semi-naked with signs of violence in colonia San Pablo de las Salinas. It is suspected to be related to a settling of accounts. Local sources, indicated that the region has become a more dangerous area due to high rates of crime. 1 fatality.
On 18 February 2025, in Morelia, Michoacan de Ocampo, unidentified individuals shot and killed a barber when he was working at his business on Tratado de Libre Comercio avenue, in Colonia Solidaridad. The victim was also an off-duty auxiliar police officer. 1 fatality.
Around 18 February 2025 (as reported), in Morelia, Michoacan, three men were killed and their bodies were found piled up with gunshot wounds in a canal in Parque Lineal Bicentenaria in Colonia Quinceo. There is no information on the perpetrators. 3 fatalities.
On 18 February 2025, in Garcia, Nuevo Leon, individuals in a vehicle shot and injured two men on Balcones del Valle street, in Colonia Balcones de Garcia (drive-by). 2 injured.
On 18 February 2025, in San Miguel Canoa, Puebla, according to witnesses, several men shot at people in a house used for the selling and consumptions of drugs in the intersection of Porfirio Diaz and 5 de Mayo streets, in Colonia Vicente Guerrero, killing at least a man and inuring at least two others. At least 1 fatality, at least 2 injured.
On 18 February 2025, in Mazatlan, Sinaloa, according to witnesses, two men shot and killed an off-duty ministerial federal police officer in the parking lot of a store on Manuel J. Clouthier avenue, in Fraccionamiento Costa Dorada. The victim's wife and son were at the scene and remained uninjured. According to the authorities, the attack responded to personal disputes and was not related to the victim's position as police officer, however, this was not confirmed. 1 fatality.
Around 18 February 2025 (as reported), in Ciudad Obregon, Sonora, a man was killed and his body was found with the head covered in tape and a red mask, the hands and feet tied and signs of torture in the intersection of Valle del Choqui and Carlos Calleja streets, in Colonia Ampliacion Miravalle. 1 fatality.
On 18 February 2025, in Minatitlan, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, two unidentified individuals entered a house on Berlin street, in Colonia Nueva Mina, and shot a man and another person. The man died and the other person was injured. This attack suspectedly responds to a settling of scores linked to the sale of drugs. 1 fatality, 1 injured.
Around 18 February 2025 (as reported), in Coahuayana de Hidalgo, Michoacan de Ocampo, two men and a woman were killed and their bodies were found with gunshot wounds inside a car next to the bridge on 200 federal road. The woman had the feet tied, one of the men had the hands tied, and the other had his left arm amputated. 3 fatalities.
Around 18 February 2025 (as reported), in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, a man was killed and his body was found with gunshot wounds, signs of torture and wrapped in plastic inside a taxi in Colonia Cumbres de Figueroa. 1 fatality.
On 18 February 2025, in Ciudad Santa Catarina, Nuevo Leon, several men abducted two men from a house that was used as a drug selling point in Colonia Arboledas de las Mitras and took them to another nearby house. There, the perpetrators beat and tortured the victims. One of them was stabbed and killed and the other was later released. One of the perpetrators was arrested in Colonia Enrique Rangel around 16 April 2025. 1 fatality, 1 injured.
Around 18 February 2025 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found with the hands tied in front of the Faculty of Agronomy of the UAS, next to the road to Costa Rica. 1 fatality.
On 18 February 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, several men aboard several vehicles arrived at a mechanic workshop on San Andres street, in Colonia Ampliacion San Benito, Sector Las Coloradas, and shot at it, killing a man who was inside. 1 fatality.
Around 17 February 2025 (month of), in Chihuahua, Chihuahua, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in a blanket in a state of decomposition in a stolen truck in Colonia Villa. 1 fatality.
On 17 February 2025, in Ciudad de Mexico - Cuauhtemoc, individuals on a motorcycle shot at a man and a woman who were driving in the intersection of Messenet and Debussy streets, in Colonia Peralvillo (drive-by). The man died, the woman was injured, and two other people (a man and a woman) were collaterally injured. 1 fatality, 3 injured.
On 17 February 2025, in Ecatepec de Morelos, Mexico, two armed individuals opened fire at a vehicle in front of the Zodiac station. One Mexibus operator was injured by a stray bullet and received medical attention. 1 injury.
On 17 February 2025, in Buenavista, Mexico, according to witnesses, two individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed a man who was driving on Jose Lopez Portillo avenue, by Cartagena, in Colonia San Mateo Cuautepec (drive-by). 1 fatality.
Around 17 February 2025 (as reported), in El Recreo, Michoacan de Ocampo, an officer of the Federal Attorney General's office was killed and his body was found with gunshot wounds and signs of torture on Apatzingan-Buenavista road. He had been abducted together with another officer on 15 February (coded separately), who was also killed and found in Zirapetiro on 16 February 2025 (coded separately). 1 fatality.
On 17 February 2025, in Jacona de Plancarte, Michoacan de Ocampo, at least two individuals shot and killed a woman farmer on Estado de Sinaloa street, in Colonia Trasierra. 1 fatality.
Around 17 February 2025 (as reported), near El Valle, Michoacan de Ocampo, a man was killed and his dismembered body was found inside a cooler on the side of the road. 1 fatality.
On 17 February 2025, in Garcia, Nuevo Leon, according to witnesses, two individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed a man who was driving in the intersection of Bosque de las Lomas avenue and Bosque Griego street, in Colonia Las Lomas (drive-by). 1 fatality.
On 17 February 2025, in Ciudad Santa Catarina, Nuevo Leon, according to witnesses, at least two men on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in the intersection of Lomas de San Pedro and Loma Azul streets, in Colonia Arboledas de las Mitras (drive-by). An alternative version indicates that this attack took place in Colonia Lomas de la Fama. 1 fatality.
On 17 February 2025, in Mazatlan Villa de Flores, Oaxaca, unknown armed individuals shot at the mayor while he was in a vehicle with his driver and three other people. Following the shooting, the victims crashed into a ravine. The driver died as the result and the mayor and three other people were injured. 1 fatality, 3 injuries.
On 17 February 2025, near Matzaco, Puebla, individuals on a motorcycle shot at a man and a woman who travelled in a van on Izucar de Matamoros-San Carlos road (drive-by). The man died and the woman was injured. 1 fatality, 1 injured.
On 17 February 2025, in Heroica Puebla de Zaragoza, Puebla, unknown armed individuals shot at the assistant and a lawyer of a law firm who were arriving for a hearing of a robbery in Colonia Reforma Agua Azul. The assistant died as a result and the lawyer was injured. 1 fatality, 1 injury.
Around 17 February 2025 (as reported), close to Campo El Diez, Sinaloa, two people were killed and their bodies were found on the Culiacan-El Dorado highway. One victim bore signs of torture and had a message next to the body and the second body was mutilated and inside plastic bags. One victim was identified as a man. 1 fatality.
Around 17 February 2025 (as reported), in Caborca, Sonora, unidentified individuals abducted a taxi driver and killed him. His body was found with a gunshot wound in the head (likely 'tiro de gracia') on Rafael Munoz street. 1 fatality.
On 17 February 2025, in Hermosillo, Sonora, unidentified individuals shot and killed a man inside a house in the intersection of Siete Cerros and San Marcos streets, in Colonia Miguel Valencia. The perpetrators left an unspecified threatening message. 1 fatality.
On 17 February 2025, in Cardenas, Tabasco, according to witnesses, unidentified individuals shot at people in a van on Miguel Hidalgo avenue, killing two men and injuring a woman and a kid. One of the men had been threatened in a message written on a sheet that was hung in Fraccionamiento La Estrella. 2 fatalities, 2 injured.
On 17 February 2025, in Villahermosa, Tabasco, unidentified individuals shot and killed a person inside a house and it on fire in Corregidora Primera Seccion. 1 fatality.
On 17 February 2025, in Huimanguillo, Tabasco, according to witnesses, unidentified individuals shot at a man and a woman and their son in Colonia Centro. The man died and the two other victims were injured. 1 fatality, 2 injured.
Around 17 February 2025 (as reported), close to Villa Union, Durango, a man was killed and his body was found with his hands tied to his back at the height of La Escondida on the Durango-Mazatlan highway. 1 fatality.
On 17 February 2025, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, two men on a motorcycle followed a man driving his car and then shot and killed him (drive-by) in Villa de Campestre. Also in Leon, two men on a motorcycle shot and killed a man when he was walking on the street in Colonia Ejido la Joya (drive-by). In a third attack, two men on a motorcycle shot and injured a man in the intersection of Fray Gil and Fray Rufino streets, in Colonia Ampliacion San Francisco (drive-by). The victim had just left a vigil of a man who was killed on 16 February 2025. And in a fourth attack, two men on a motorcycle shot and killed a man on Vinas street, in Colonia Paseos de las Joyas (drive-by). 3 fatalities.
On 17 February 2025, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, two armed individuals intercepted an Uber driver and shot and killed him on Juan Alonso de Torres boulevard, in Colonia Valle del Campestre, and then fled the scene. Two men were arrested and the authorities seized a fireweapon and a motorcycle. 1 fatality.
On 17 February 2025, in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, several armed individuals on a motorcycle opened fire at a taxi stand on the coastline Miguel Aleman. One person was injured as a result. 1 injury.
On 17 February 2025, in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, two armed men broke into a Mexican Social Security Institute (IMSS) and shot a patient to death in Colonia Ciudad Renacimiento. 1 fatality.
Around 17 February 2025 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found with signs of torture and handcuffed floating in a canal in the south of the city wrapped in a blanket. 1 fatality.
On 17 February 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, unknown armed individuals opened fire from a vehicle (drive-by) and killed a man on his motorcycle in the south of the city on the Benito Juarez highway. 1 fatality.
Around 16 February 2025 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a person was attacked and two dismembered limbs were found inside a garbage can in the north of the city. One person was arrested.
On 16 February 2025, in Ciudad de Mexico - Cuauhtemoc, two suspected members of Fuerza Anti Union shot at people in the intersection of Toltecas and Penon streets, in Colonia Morelos, killing one and injuring four. Both perpetrators were arrested in separate operations. 1 fatality, 4 injured.
On 16 February 2025, in Celaya, Guanajuato, two men opened fire and shot a man to death and then fled the scene in Colonia Girasoles. 1 fatality.
On 16 February 2025, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, two men shot and killed a woman vendor at the Sunday market in the intersection of Articulo de Fe and Canal de Sardaneta streets, in Colonia Nuevo Leon. 1 fatality.
On 16 February 2025, in Tlapa de Comonfort, Guerrero, a man followed a woman into the ejidal police station in Colonia San Francisco, shot the woman and then fled the scene on a motorcycle driven by an accomplice. The victim was identified as an activist and district councilor of the National Electoral Institute (INE) as well as the daughter of the regional delegate of the Government of the General Secretariat. 1 injury.
On 16 February 2025, in Ojuelos de Jalisco, Jalisco, unidentified individuals abducted a man. On 17 February, military and police officers released the victim together with another man who had also been kidnapped on 9 February (coded separately).
On 16 February 2025, in Poncitlan, Jalisco, unknown armed individuals set fire to the home of the family of the former regional prosecutor of Jalisco who was killed in Pincitlan in 2019 (coded separately). The attack is suspected to be related to threats by criminal groups. After the death of the former prosecutor, his family was granted with protection measures which were recently revoked. There were no injuries.
On 16 February 2025, in Tlaquepaque, Jalisco, according to witnesses, two men on a motorcycle shot at three men in the intersection of Venustiano Carranza and Torrecillas streets, in Colonia Francisco I Madero (drive-by). Two men died and the other was injured. 2 fatalities, 1 injured.
Around 16 February 2025 (as reported), in Zirapetiro, Michoacan de Ocampo, an officer of the Federal Attorney General's office was killed and his body was found with gunshot wounds and signs of torture on Apatzingan-Buenavista road. The victim had been abducted together with another officer on 15 February (coded separately), who was also killed and found in El Recreo on 17 February 2025 (coded separately). 1 fatality.
On 16 February 2025, in Morelia, Michoacan de Ocampo, at least three armed men opened fire soccer teams of the municipal police officer league in Colonia Paseo de la Independencia. There were six people injured as a result. 6 injuries.
Around 16 February 2025 (as reported), in Zamora de Hidalgo, Michoacan de Ocampo, two men were killed and their bodies were found with gunshot wounds at a plaza in Colonia Miguel Hidalgo. A message was found next to the bodies. 2 fatalities.
On 16 February 2025, in Zamora de Hidalgo, Michoacan de Ocampo, armed individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in a vehicle in the center of the city (drive-by) and then fled the scene. The man died as a result. 1 fatality.
On 16 February 2025, in Monterrey, Nuevo Leon, armed men on a motorcycle passed by a man driving a motorcycle and opened fire at him (drive-by) in Colonia San Angel Sur and then fled the scene. The man died as a result. 1 fatality.
Around 16 February 2025 (as reported), in Licenciado Benito Juarez, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in blankets near a drain in Colonia Las Vegas. 1 fatality.
On 16 February 2025, in Caborca, Sonora, unknown armed individuals opened fire at the home of the deputy commissioner of Public Security (police force). The clashes are being linked to the arrest of the leader of a criminal cell the day before. There were no injuries.
Around 16 February 2025 (between 15 - 17 February), in Reynosa, Tamaulipas, a man was killed and his body was found with signs of violence and asphyxia next to Rodhe canal. The victim had disappeared during the weekend and his body was found on 17 February 2025. He was the former director of Cedes prison and a volleyball teacher at the Autonomous University of Tamaulipas. 1 fatality.
On 16 February 2025, in Cordoba, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, unknown armed individuals shot and killed a man inside a nightclub. The victim was identified as the nephew of the candidate for mayor in Cordoba. 1 fatality.
On 16 February 2025, in Caborca, Sonora, unknown armed individuals fired from a vehicle (drive-by) at a hotel where State Police officers were staying, causing damage to the facade. The attack is being linked to the arrest of the leader of a criminal cell the day before. There were no injuries.
Around 16 February 2025 (as reported), in Ciudad de Villa de Alvarez, Colima, two men were killed and their bodies were found with signs of torture and with their hands and feet tied in El Naranjal. 2 fatalities
Around 16 February 2025 (as reported), in Los Mochis, Sinaloa, a woman and her six-year-old son were killed and their bodies were stabbed in a house that was set on fire. 2 fatalities.
On 15 February 2025, in Ciudad de Mexico - Iztacalco, unknown armed men opened fire and shot four people in a bar in Colonia Agricola Oriental. Four people were injured as a result and the armed men fled on several motorcycles. 4 injuries.
Around 15 February 2025 (as reported), in Zapopan, Jalisco, a man was killed and the decapitated head was found inside a plastic bag in Colonia Colinas de la Primavera. 1 fatality.
Around 15 February 2025 (as reported), in Ecatepec de Morelos, Mexico, two people were killed and their bodies were found wrapped in bags in Colonia El Chamizal. 2 fatalities.
On 15 February 2025, in Cuernavaca, Morelos, armed individuals entered a home and shot a man to death in Colonia Nueva Santa Maria and then fled the scene aboard four motorcycles. 1 fatality.
Around 15 February 2025 (as reported), in Jiutepec, Morelos, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in a tarp in Colonia El Porvenir with his hands and feet tied. 1 fatality.
On 15 February 2025, in Yehualtepec, Puebla, according to a video published on social media, municipal police officers hit and injured two men who had been arrested. Residents who were able to record the video claimed that this was a case of abuse of authority. 2 injured.
Around 15 February 2025 (as reported), in Ciudad Obregon, Sonora, a person was killed and the body was found inside a plastic bag in a refrigerator in Colonia Sierra Vista. 1 fatality.
On 15 February 2025, in Villahermosa, Tabasco, a couple of armed individuals shot a man repeatedly in Colonia Centro who died as a result. 1 fatality.
On 15 February 2025, in San Pedro Piedra Gorda, Zacatecas, armed men traveling in nine vehicles arrived in Colonia Nuevo Milenio and opened fire at two homes and several cars outside. According to neighbors, six people were kidnapped, although this was not confirmed. The armed men set (narco) roadblocks and check points to prevent police from chasing them. There were no injuries.
On 15 February 2025, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, two men on a motorcycle shot and killed a man on Cinco street, in Colonia Chulavista (drive-by). 1 fatality.
Around 15 February 2025 (as reported), in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, a man was killed and his body was found decapitated in Colonia Vista Alegre. 1 fatality.
On 15 February 2025, in Apatzingan de la Constitucion, Michoacan de Ocampo, unknown armed individuals shot and killed a man who was working in a carwash. Days before this attack, on 9 February, the victim's brother who was suspectedly involved in drug dealing, was killed (coded separately). 1 fatality.
On 15 February 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, unknown armed individuals kidnapped an off-duty officer of the State Attorney General's Office. The victim was released on 17 February in Colonia Los Huizaches without injuries.
On 14 February 2025, in Tijuana, Baja California, two unidentified individuals entered La Gloria motel and shot and killed a man. The individuals later clashed with municipal police officers who arrived at the scene (coded separately). 1 fatality.
Around 14 February 2025 (as reported), in Tlajomulco de Zuniga, Jalisco, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in plastic on a path that leads to La Purisima and the roads to Chapala and Via Alameda, in Fraccionamiento Los Silos. 1 fatality.
On 14 February 2025, in La Paz, Baja California Sur, six individuals abducted, hit, and cut off the finger of a man. The perpetrators then released the victim. 1 injured.
Around 14 February 2025 (between 13 - 15 February) in Las Choapas, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, a man was killed and his body was found dismembered inside plastic bags on the Las Choapas-Francisco Rueda highway on 15 February. The man was kidnapped on 13 February. 1 fatality.
On 14 February 2025, in Acayucan, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, several armed individuals kidnapped a man when he was leaving his home in Colonia El Fenix. The kidnapped is likely to be linked to extortion payments. The whereabouts of the man remain unknown.
Around 14 February 2025 (as reported), in Las Choapas, Veracruz, a person was killed and the body was found dismembered on Las Choapas-Ocozocoautla in direction to Francisco Rueda. 1 fatality.
On 14 February 2025, in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, armed men entered Donato G. Fonseca General Hospital in Colonia Ciudad Renacimiento and shot and killed a patient. The victim had been previously shot and injured in the pantheon of Las Cruces. 1 fatality.
Around 14 February 2025 (between 12 - 16 February), in Martinez de la Torre, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, a woman was killed and her body was found on 16 February with signs of torture. The woman was reported missing on 12 February. 1 fatality.
On 13 February 2025, in Silao de la Victoria, Guanajuato, unidentified individuals abducted a man and tied him. The victim managed to flee and took refuge in a pharmacy in Leon.
On 13 February 2025, in San Luis Potosi, San Luis Potosi, according to witnesses, at least two individuals entered a music store on San Angel avenue, in Colonia San Angel, and shot and killed the owner. 1 fatality.
Around 13 February 2025 (as reported), in San Francisco Tlaloc, Puebla, four men shot at a house and killed a person who was inside. The perpetrators were later arrested in Espiritu Santo, Tlaxcala, where they were found injured and together with a dead man (coded separately). 1 fatality.
On 13 February 2025, in San Luis Rio Colorado, Sonora, according to witnesses, unidentified individuals shot and killed a man who was driving a van in the intersection of 17 Street and Mesa Arenosa canal. 1 fatality.
On 13 February 2025, in Mazatlan, Sinaloa, unidentified individuals in a vehicle shot at a van on Gabriel Leyva avenue, injuring a man (drive-by). The victim got off the vehicle and took refuge at the nearby Nautical School. 1 injured.
Around 13 February 2025 (as reported), in Costa Rica, Sinaloa, a man was shot and killed and, according to witnesses, unidentified individuals threw his body and a cardboard with an unspecified threatening message from a vehicle in the intersection of La 20 and Culiacan-Eldorado road. 1 fatality.
Around 13 February 2025 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a man was killed and his body was found with the arms and legs tied inside a plastic bag on International avenue, in Colonia Zona Centro. 1 fatality.
Around 13 February 2025 (as reported), in Tizayuca, Hidalgo, a man was killed and his body was found with the hands tied, signs of torture, and inside a plastic bag in a construction site in the intersection of Fortuna and Pedro Maria Anaya streets, in Fraccionamiento Olmos. 1 fatality.
Around 13 February 2025 (as reported), in El Salado, Puebla, a man was killed and his beheaded body and decapitated head were found near Tecamachalco-Canada de Morelos state road. 1 fatality.
On 13 February 2025, in Isla Mujeres, Quintana Roo, two underage boys shot at people inside a house, killing two people and injuring two others, including a minor. The attack was a settling of scores between motorcycle theft and drug distribution gangs. The perpetrators were arrested. 2 fatalities, 2 injured.
Around 13 February 2025 (as reported), in Tabasco, Zacatecas, three people were killed and their beheaded bodies were found on Corregidora Josefa Ortiz de Dominguez avenue. Next to the bodies, there was a cardboard with a threatening message against the Secretariat of Public Safety and the state offices of the Attorney General. 3 fatalities.
Around 13 February 2025 (as reported), in Ejido Hipolito Renteria, Baja California, a man was killed and his naked body was found with signs of violence on a path next to the premises of the State Commission for Public Services. 1 fatality.
Around 13 February 2025 (as reported), in Espiritu Santo, Tlaxcala, a man was killed, and his body was found in a house where four injured men were arrested. The men were arrested after shooting at a house and killing a person in San Francisco Tlaloc (coded separately). The reasons for the injuries and the death of the man are unknown. 1 fatality.
Around 13 February 2025 (as reported), in Tlaquepaque, Jalisco, a woman was killed and her body was found on fire in Colonia Las Pomas. 1 fatality.
On 13 February 2025, in Santo Domingo Petapa, Oaxaca, members of Santo Domingo Petapa Communal Militia shot and killed three Mixe men, members of the Union of Indigenous Communities of the Northern Zone of the Isthmus (Ucizoni), who travelled in a van in an area known as Rio del Sol. One of the victims was the Delegate of the organization. After the attack, the perpetrators threatened to enter the town of El Platanillo, whose inhabitants are barricaded. 3 fatalities.
On 13 February 2025, in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, unidentified individuals chased and shot and injured a man on Vicente Guerrero boulevard, near Las Cruces pantheon. The victim managed to escape by his own means and was likely able to testify. 1 injured.
Around 13 February 2025 (as reported), in the municipality of Tapachula (coded to Tapachula de Cordova y Ordonez), Chiapas, a man was killed and his body was found gagged and with the hands tied in the Coatan river. 1 fatality.
Around 13 February 2025 (as reported), in La Palma, Michoacan de Ocampo, a man was killed and his semi-naked body was found with gunshot wounds and the hands tied a few meters from the San Juan Benito Juarez-Chehuayito path, next to Morelia-Salamanca road. 1 fatality.
On 13 February 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, according to witnesses, unidentified individuals abducted a man on Jose Vasconcelos streets, in Fraccionamiento Stanza Torralba, Sector Villas del Real. This abduction is likely linked to simultaneous clashes in the city and to the conflict between factions of the Sinaloa Cartel. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.
On 13 February 2025, in Martinez de la Torre, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, according to witnesses, unidentified individuals shot and killed a man in Colonia San Manuel. 1 fatality.
On 13 February 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, according to witnesses, unidentified individuals shot and killed a man who was driving a bike on Alvaro Obregon avenue, in Fraccionamiento Villa Bonita. 1 fatality.
On 12 February 2025, in Celaya, Guanajuato, unidentified individuals shot and killed the off-duty head of security of Celaya's mayor when he left his house on Plan de Ayala street to go to work. A video on social media suspectedly posted by the Jalisco New Generation Cartel (CJNG) claimed responsibility for the attack and threatened those who support Santa Rosa de Lima Cartel (CSRL). 1 fatality.
On 12 February 2025, in Lacanja Chansayab, Chiapas, members of Segundo Cabrero Lopez Gang entered an indigenous assembly that was debating insecurity in the area and shot and injured one or two people. The perpetrators also shot at the wheels of a vehicle and demanded the residents to set up (narco) roadblocks to prevent the Pakal Unit of the state police from accessing the area. Between 1 and 2 injured.
On 12 February 2025, in San Miguel Panixtlahuaca, Oaxaca, unknown armed individuals shot and killed the councilor of the Treasury of the municipality. 1 fatality.
Around 12 February 2025 (as reported), in Tlajomulco de Zuniga, Jalisco, a woman was killed and her body was found inside a suitcase in the intersection of Lomas del Mirador boulevard and Cerro Aconcagua street, in Fraccionamiento Lomas del Mirador. Two suspects were arrested. 1 fatality.
On 12 February 2025, in Amatlan de los Reyes, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, according to witnesses, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a woman who was working at her hamburgers and hot dogs stand on Veracruz Avenue, in Erasmo Castellanos (Penuela) Housing Complex. Another person was also shot and injured. 1 fatality, 1 injured.

Around 12 February 2025 (as reported), in Morelia, Michoacan de Ocampo, a man was killed and his body was found handcuffed and with a gunshot wound in the head (likely 'tiro de gracia') on Cueramo street, in Colonia Santa Fe. 1 fatality.
On 12 February 2025, in Ciudad de Mexico - Gustavo A. Madero, nine men hit and killed a man and then set fire to his body inside a garbage heap on Enriqueta street, in Colonia Bondojito. Around 12 February 2025 (between 11 - 14 February), around Patzcuaro, Michoacan de Ocampo, a man was killed and his body was found gagged with tape, the hands tied, a towel around the neck, signs of torture, and wrapped in blankets near the exit towards Bonilla on the road to Uruapan. Around 12 February 2025 (as reported), in Tejaro de Los Izquierdo, Michoacan de Ocampo, a man was killed and his body was found tied and with a gunshot to his head in Colonia El Calabozo. 1 fatality.

Around 12 February 2025 (as reported), in Chihuahua, Chihuahua, a man was killed and his body was found burned, with gunshot wounds inside a suitcase between Colonias Inalambrica and Burocratica Federal. 1 fatality.
On 12 February 2025, in Monterrey, Nuevo Leon, according to witnesses, two men in a vehicle approached a man in the intersection of Paseo la Hacienda and Paseo Norte, in Colonia Fomerrey 45, and shot and killed him from a short distance. Around 12 February 2025 (between 5 - 23 February), in El Cachanilla, Baja California Sur, two elderly people were killed and their bodies were found buried and with signs of torture underneath their home in Colonia Prohogar. On 11 February 2025, in Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo, five members of an unspecified gang shot and killed a man. The perpetrators were later arrested during a clash with police officers not related to this event on 4 April 2025. 1 fatality.

simple_summary:
### Strategic Developments in Mexico, February 2025

**Key Developments:**

1. **Arrests and Extraditions:**
   - **High-Profile Arrests:** Abraham Oseguera Cervantes, alias 'Don Rodo,' brother of Nemesio Oseguera Cervantes ('El Mencho'), leader of the Jalisco New Generation Cartel (CJNG), was arrested in Atarjeas de Covarrubias, Jalisco (Event ID: 28 February 2025, Atarjeas de Covarrubias, Jalisco).
   - **Extraditions:** 29 drug traffickers, including prominent figures from Los Zetas, were extradited to the United States (Event ID: 28 February 2025, Atarjeas de Covarrubias, Jalisco).

2. **Drug Laboratory Seizures:**
   - **Sinaloa State:** Multiple clandestine drug laboratories were seized across Sinaloa, including in Navolato, Culiacan Rosales, and other municipalities. These operations involved the seizure of significant quantities of methamphetamine and chemical precursors (Event IDs: 27-28 February 2025, various locations in Sinaloa).
   - **Other States:** Similar operations were conducted in Michoacán, Jalisco, and other states, leading to the destruction of numerous drug labs and the seizure of large amounts of illegal substances (Event IDs: 27-28 February 2025, various locations).

3. **Security Operations:**
   - **Surveillance Cameras:** Authorities removed hundreds of irregular surveillance cameras installed by armed groups in Sinaloa and other states, disrupting criminal operations (Event IDs: 27-28 February 2025, Navolato, Sinaloa; 27 February 2025, Costa Rica, Sinaloa).
   - **Narco Camps and Roadblocks:** Security forces dismantled several narco camps and roadblocks set up by criminal groups, particularly in Michoacán and Sonora (Event IDs: 24 February 2025, various locations in Sonora; 25 February 2025, Michoacán de Ocampo).

4. **Weapons and Explosives Seizures:**
   - **Weapons:** Significant quantities of firearms, ammunition, and tactical equipment were seized in various operations, including in Chihuahua and Michoacán (Event IDs: 13 February 2025, Nuevo Casas Grandes, Chihuahua; 24 February 2025, Paracuaro, Michoacán).
   - **Explosives:** Numerous explosive devices, including IEDs and grenades, were defused or seized in Tamaulipas, Sinaloa, and other states (Event IDs: 24 February 2025, various locations in Tamaulipas; 21 February 2025, Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa).

5. **Security Reinforcements:**
   - **Military Deployments:** Additional military and National Guard personnel were deployed in key areas, including Sinaloa, Sonora, and Guanajuato, to enhance security operations (Event IDs: 18 February 2025, Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa; 17 February 2025, Hermosillo, Sonora; 14 February 2025, Celaya, Guanajuato).

6. **Protests and Social Unrest:**
   - **Teacher Protests:** Teachers across multiple states, including Morelos, Zacatecas, and Guerrero, protested to demand better labor conditions and scholarship payments (Event IDs: 19 February 2025, various locations).
   - **Healthcare Workers:** Healthcare workers in Mexico City and other regions protested against outstanding payments and lack of resources (Event IDs: 17 February 2025, Ecatepec de Morelos, Mexico; 21 February 2025, Ciudad de Mexico - Cuauhtemoc).

7. **Violent Incidents:**
   - **Fatalities and Injuries:** Several violent incidents resulted in fatalities and injuries, including clashes between criminal groups and security forces, as well as targeted attacks (Event IDs: 25 February 2025, Costa Rica, Sinaloa; 24 February 2025, Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero).

These strategic developments highlight the ongoing efforts by Mexican authorities to combat organized crime and enhance security, amidst significant social unrest and violent incidents.

Property destruction: On 13 February 2025, in Villa Hidalgo, Jalisco, the authorities dismantled a workshop belonging to the Jalisco New Generation Cartel (CJNG) in the intersection of Jose Esqueda and Agustin Yanez streets, where they dismantled a surveillance system that included 114 cameras in public spaces and seized three armored vehicles, three fireweapons, and chemical material for the manufacture of explosives. Two individuals were arrested.
Non-violent activity: On 13 February 2025, in Chandio, Michoacan de Ocampo, an unidentified criminal group used vehicles to set a (narco) roadblock on Apatzingan-Aguililla road. This event is linked to other roadblocks and clashes that took place in Michoacan the same day (coded separately).
Non-violent activity: On 13 February 2025, in La Huina, Michoacan de Ocampo, an unidentified criminal group used vehicles to set a (narco) roadblock on Apatzingan-Aguililla road. This event is linked to other roadblocks and clashes that took place in Michoacan the same day (coded separately).
Non-violent activity: On 13 February 2025, in El Recreo, Michoacan de Ocampo, an unidentified criminal group used vehicles to set a (narco) roadblock on Apatzingan-Buenavista road. This event is linked to other roadblocks and clashes that took place in Michoacan the same day (coded separately).
Non-violent activity: On 13 February 2025, in La Majada, Michoacan de Ocampo, an unidentified criminal group used vehicles to set a (narco) roadblock on Apatzingan-Buenavista road. This event is linked to other roadblocks and clashes that took place in Michoacan the same day (coded separately).
Non-violent activity: On 13 February 2025, in Vicente Guerrero, Michoacan de Ocampo, an unidentified criminal group used vehicles to set a (narco) roadblock on Apatzingan-Buenavista road. This event is linked to other roadblocks and clashes that took place in Michoacan the same day (coded separately).
Non-violent activity: On 13 February 2025, in Rancho Seco, Michoacan de Ocampo, an unidentified criminal group used vehicles to set a (narco) roadblock on Apatzingan-Buenavista road. This event is linked to other roadblocks and clashes that took place in Michoacan the same day (coded separately).
Weapons seizure: On 13 February 2025, in Teocaltiche, Jalisco, the authorities arrested two members of the Jalisco New Generation Cartel (CJNG) in the intersection of Panama and Nicaragua streets, in Los Arcos neighborhood, and seized 300 grams of PE4 explosive, a grenade, other explosive material (detonating cord, electronic matches, detonators, cables), two fireweapons, and a vehicle.
Security measures: On 12 February 2025, in Villa Hidalgo, Jalisco, the authorities deployed 120 additional state police, military, and National Guard officers to reinforce security operations in the area.
Property destruction: On 12 February 2025, in Santiago Niltepec, Oaxaca, elements of the military, the state Attorney General's Office, the National Guard and the state police seized three tons of marihuana traveling towards Mexico City and arrested one person.
Property destruction: On 12 February 2025, in Chila, Puebla, unknown individuals set fire to a unit for the transport of people with disabilities. The vehicle was an official vehicle of the local administration of the National System for the Integral Development of the Family (DIF). It is suspected that the event is linked to the arrest of individuals who attacked police officers days earlier in a street fight and remained in detention.
Property destruction: On 12 February 2025, in the municipality of Cosala, Sinaloa, military officers seized an unspecified number of narco laboratories and drug warehouses as part of an operation that led to the seizure of seven laboratories and nine warehouses in Cosala and Culiacan (coded separately).
Property destruction: On 12 February 2025, in the municipality of Culiacan (coded to Culiacan Rosales), Sinaloa, military officers seized an unspecified number of narco laboratories and drug warehouses as part of an operation that led to the seizure of seven laboratories and nine warehouses in Culiacan and Cosala (coded separately).
Defusal: On 11 February 2025, in El Razo del Organo, Michoacan de Ocampo, the military and the National Guard located and deactivated 12 explosive devices when they were carrying out an operation. There were no injuries.
Defusal: On 11 February 2025, in Zapopan, Jalisco, elements of the state police and the military located an explosive device in Colonia El Cooli on a farm and seized it.
Property destruction: On 11 February 2025, in La Vitela, Michoacan de Ocampo, elements of the National Guard, the military and the state police seized a drug laboratory.
Security measures: Around 10 February 2025 (as reported), in the state of Coahuila de Zaragoza (coded to Saltillo), members of the National Guard reinforced the security in the border area. The National Guard members was increased to 1,000 where 100 agents were assigned to each of the customs offices.
Defusal: Around 10 February 2025 (as reported), in Tamaulipas state (coded to Ciudad Victoria), during an operation Army elements and the National Guard, ministerial and state police located 40 explosive devices placed by organized crime in northern Tamaulipas during patrols. The explosive devices were located in gaps and roads of the state is being carried out. These findings of narcomines and Land explosives have generated a risk factor in the security protocol applied by the electoral referee in the coming electoral process in the state. The authorities have warned their staff not to enter into breaches.
Property destruction: On 10 February 2025, in Garcia, Nuevo Leon, members of the Secretariats of National Defense (Defensa), Navy (Semar), the state and ministerial police and the National Guard dismantled a clandestine laboratory used for the manufacture of chemical drugs.
Property destruction: On 10 February 2025, in Uruapan, Michoacan, military personnel secured an area where materials for the production of methamphetamine were concentrated. They seized 1,000 liters of chemical substances, three organic synthesis reactors, and three condensers worth 22 million pesos.

graphRAG_summary:
### Summary of Key Battles in Mexico, February 2025

**High Fatality Incidents:**
- **Guanajuato (MEX100007):** On February 23, eight people were killed in Colonia Alameda de Vista Hermosa, Guanajuato, when unidentified men in two vehicles shot at a house. Four perpetrators were arrested after a clash with municipal police and National Guard officers.
- **Guerrero (MEX99437):** On February 15, five men were killed in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, after an ambush on an ambulance. The victims were involved in a previous clash with a rival criminal group.
- **Sinaloa (MEX99103):** On February 13, four unidentified individuals were killed in Ejido Canan, Sinaloa, after shooting at military officers on the Culiacan-Eldorado road.

**Significant Clashes:**
- **Michoacan de Ocampo (MEX99479):** On February 16, two police officers were tortured and killed by members of the Michoacan Nueva Generacion Cartel in Zirapetiro.
- **Sinaloa (MEX99574):** On February 17, clashes between Los Chapitos and Los Mayitos gangs in Culiacan Rosales resulted in at least two fatalities and nine injuries.
- **Baja California (MEX99906):** On February 22, two unidentified men were killed in Playas de Rosarito after shooting at municipal police officers, who repelled the attack and chased the perpetrators.

**Other Notable Events:**
- **Guanajuato (MEX99998):** On February 27, two municipal police officers were killed in Apaseo el Alto while guarding a game at the Deportivo San Fernando.
- **Sinaloa (MEX100304):** On February 27, two men were killed in Licenciado Benito Juarez (Villa Juarez) during a clash between rival armed individuals.
- **Nuevo Leon (MEX100161):** On February 28, two people were killed in China municipality during an armed clash between members of a criminal organization.

**Incidents with No Fatalities:**
- **Nuevo Leon (MEX99108):** On February 10, three police officers were injured in Mina during an attack by armed individuals.
- **Sinaloa (MEX99099):** On February 11, two men were injured in El Limon de los Ramos during a clash with military and state police.
- **Michoacan de Ocampo (MEX100140):** On February 22, two individuals were injured in La Trasquila during a clash between the Jalisco New Generation Cartel and military officers.

**Summary:**
February 2025 saw a series of violent clashes across Mexico, particularly in states like Guanajuato, Guerrero, Sinaloa, Michoacan de Ocampo, and Baja California. These incidents involved rival criminal groups, drug trafficking, and clashes with law enforcement. The high number of fatalities and injuries underscores the ongoing conflict and instability in these regions.
