corpus:
On 30 April 2025, in Palo Blanco, Guerrero, more than 200 students who arrived in 13 buses and vehicles, members of the Federation of Socialist Peasant Students of Mexico (FECSM), led by the Ayotzinapa Normal School held a demonstration and threw firecrackers and Molotov cocktails at the toll booth on the Autopista del Sol Mexico-Acapulco Highway to demand justice for the killing of the leader of the Council of Ejidos and Communities Opposed to the La Parota Dam (CECOP) members of the FECSM.
On 29 April 2025, in Ixtapa, Chiapas, a man from Venezuela was held and beaten up by merchants after he was trying to extort one of them and asked for 30,000 pesos. He was later arrested.
On 28 April 2025, in Torreon, Coahuila de Zaragoza, municipal police officers suspectedly engaged in a fight at the Municipal Directorate of Public Safety under unknown circumstances. The fight is related to the labor strike and demonstrations that some of them held earlier the same day to denounce the activities of their superiors (coded separately). After the fight, it was reported that an officer was handcuffed, 15 were locked in offices, 10 had been beat and 50 were retained in the patio of the police premises. At least 10 injured.
Around 27 April 2025 (as reported), in Tulancingo, Hidalgo, residents retained and beat a man who had suspectedly attempted to steal a motorcycle on Privada Galeana street, in colonia San Rafael. Municipal police and National Guard officers arrived at the scene and arrested the man. 1 injured.
On 27 April 2025, in Santa Maria Tulpetlac, Mexico, residents detained, tied and beat a man in the intersection of Chiconcuac and Culiacan streets, who had suspectedly sexually abused two women. 1 injured.
On 27 April 2025, in Francisco I. Madero, Puebla, supporters of one of the candidates for assistant inspector entered the polling stations violently (methods unknown), which led to the suspension of the elections. People who demanded the authorities to accept the results demonstrated the day after (coded separately).
On 26 April 2025, in Apatzingan de la Constitucion, Michoacan de Ocampo, 40 suspected supporters of MORENA threw chairs at a senator of the same party in an event held at Villa del Sol Hotel (or Posada del Sol), suspectedly due to a dispute over the party's candidacy for governor or over the judicial elections scheduled for 1 June 2025. Several people were hit by the chairs, although it is unknown whether they or the senator were injured. A local congressman and vice-president of the state congress who was at the event claimed that the state governor and the mayor of Uruapan had sent the rioters. Five men were arrested.
On 26 April 2025, in Tianguismanalco, Puebla, almost 50 residents of San Juan Tianguismanalco beat and doused with gasoline two men and a woman who were guarding a building that contained stolen vehicles on 9 Oriente street. Municipal and state police officers arrested the three of them. During the police intervention, the rioters retained nine state police officers (methods unknown). 3 injured.
On 26 April 2025, in Monterrey, Nuevo Leon, suspected drug users set fire to a house in the intersection of Quelonia and Martires de Chicago streets, in colonia Valle de San Martin, for unknown reasons. According to residents, the house was frequented by homeless people.
On 26 April 2025, in Ciudad de San Pablo del Monte, Tlaxcala, residents gathered outside the municipal police headquarters in El Cristo neighborhood to demand the handover of three men who had been arrested for robbing a house, whom they intended to lynch. The men had previously been detained by another group of residents, who handled them over to the police. Municipal and state police officers used tear gas and shot into the air to disperse the residents, but the bullets killed a woman and injured another person. According to witnesses, it was not stray bullets, but the officer shot at the crowd. The residents burned one of the police vehicles, attempted to enter the police premises and detained and injured two officers. 1 fatality, 3 injured.
On 25 April 2025, in Santa Clara Ocoyucan, Puebla, residents held a man, beat him up and set him on fire after he was accused to be a thief and to be involved in extortion against merchants. The man died due to the injuries. A woman who was with him was also injured. 1 fatality.
On 25 April 2025, in Acatzingo de Hidalgo, Puebla, residents and motorcycle taxi drivers set fire to the entrance to the Municipal Palace, as well as a security patrol car, after authorities refused to hand over two men who they accused of robbery in San Juan Acozac. Another version is that the residents found out that these two men were going to be released.
On 25 April 2025, in Rancho Colorado, Mexico, over 300 residents disarmed and beat a man and a woman who suspectedly were members of the Jalisco New Generation Cartel (CJNG) and had assaulted a family. Two other men who participated in the assault escaped. Before being disarmed, the man and the woman shot at the residents, killing a man and injuring another. The rioters burned their vehicle and attempted to lynch them. The latter was prevented by police officers who arrived at the scene and arrested both individuals. Alternative versions indicated that the man or both the man and the woman were lynched. At least 1 fatality, 1 injured.
On 24 April 2025, in San Bernardino Chalchihuapan, Puebla, almost 350 residents lynched and used gasoline to burn a man who had suspectedly assaulted and extorted transport drivers. The authorities arrived at the scene and rescued his partner, although it is unknown whether he/she was injured. 1 fatality.
Around 23 April 2025 (as reported), in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, residents beat and injured a man on Cuauhtemoc avenue who suspectedly intended to murder a person. 1 injured.
On 23 April 2025, around Pomacuaran, Michoacan de Ocampo, farmers used vehicles and burned tires to block Uruapan-Paracho road to demand the release of three Civil Guard officers (two men and a woman) who had been arrested after they participated in a demonstration were they demanded a better salary.
On 23 April 2025, in Vicente Guerrero, Tabasco, members of the La Chontalpa union demonstrated in front of the oil field facilities near Sector Carrillo Fuentes over allocating vacancies in an oil field. While they were demonstrating, members of the Los Danzas Union arrived, and a confrontation began, during which both groups threw Molotov cocktails and various objects at each other. At one point, members of Los Dazas started firing shots, killing one person and injuring five. 1 fatality, 5 injured.
Around 22 April 2025 (as reported), in Rincon de Tamayo, Guanajuato, according to the victim, a group of residents beat and injured the municipal delegate of the PVEM party due to the water shortage in the community. The perpetrators also rejected that the Municipal Board of Drinking Water and Sewerage (JUMAPA) assumed the administration and supply of water in the area.
On 22 April 2025, in Atoyac de Alvarez, Guerrero, unknown people held, stripped, and tied up three people on Juan Alvarez Avenue in front of the taxi stand on the Atoyac-Chilpancingo route. The naked people were left with messages accusing them of stealing motorcycles.
On 22 April 2025, in San Rafael Chamapa, Mexico, a group of people engaged in pushing and shoving with employees of the Prosecutor's office in the intersection of Diaz and Calzada de Guadalupe streets. The civilians claimed that the officers demanded them to pay money so they would to speed up the process to remove the body of their relative, who had just been shot and killed (uncoded). It is unknown whether there were injured.
On 20 April 2025, in Monterrey, Nuevo Leon, local police officers physically clashed with an unspecified number of rioters who tried to prevent the arrest of a person for supposedly participating in robberies. The event, which took place in Colonia 10 de Marzo, was recorded and broadcast on social networks. A man was arrested for resisting arrest, and a woman and a two-year-old child were injured. 2 injured.
On 18 April 2025, in Monterrey, Nuevo Leon, almost 20 scrap metal thieves threw stones at municipal police, National Guard and private security officers who approached them on the railways in the intersection of Martin Carrera and Mariano de la Garza streets, in Colonia Nino Artillero. A security guard was injured. 1 injured.
On 18 April 2025, in Teolocholco, Tlaxcala, residents captured a man accused of attempted theft and beat him in an attempted lynching. Police officers later arrived to the scene and arrested the man.
Around 16 April 2025 (as reported), in Puente Madera, Oaxaca, residents of Puente Madera and San Blas Atempa looted a bus of Autotransportes Istmenos and used it to block km. 276 of 185 Transistmica road during at least three days to demand justice for a resident who was hit by a hit-and-run driver.
On 16 April 2025, in Tecamachalco, Puebla, residents beat two men who had robbed a vehicle in Colonia Lomas de Romero. The rioters threatened to burn the victims and lynch them. Municipal, state and military officers arrived at the scene and arrested the men. 2 injured.
Around 16 April 2025 (as reported), in Xalapa-Enriquez, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, according to witnesses, two groups of residents of Colonia Porton Colorado armed with stones and sticks engaged in a fight on Frambuesa street over the propriety of a piece of land. Three men were injured. 3 injured.
On 16 April 2025, in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, over 500 taxi and public transport drivers used their vehicles and three coffins, which they set on fire, to block Mexico-Acapulco federal road in Paso Limonero during over three hours to demand security measures and the dismissal of the state governor. One of the demonstrators was shot and killed later the same day (coded separately).
On 15 April 2025, in Santa Maria Huiramangaro, Michoacan de Ocampo, indigenous normalista students, farmers and relatives of a student of Rural Vasco de Quiroga school who disappeared in Tiripetio on 13 April 2025 used burning tires to block Patzcuaro-Uruapan road and demand that he be located. Additional demonstrations took place in Zirahuen and Morelia (coded separately). The student's body was found in Lagunillas on 18 April 2025 (coded separately).
On 14 April 2025, in Aranza, Michoacan, indigenous community members seized a patrol car and set it on fire on the bypass connecting to the community to demand the dismissal of the chief of the locality. The rioters also held an unspecified number of trucks suspectedly as part of the same demonstration.
On 13 April 2025, in Tehuacan, Puebla, residents of Santa Maria Coapa area held police officers and damaged police patrols after the police arrested at least three individuals who were accused by the residents to be thieves in the area. The event was sparked after the residents discovered stolen objects in an apartment.
On 12 April 2025, in Texcoco de Mora, Mexico, people who attended the 'Horse Fair' attacked a singer by destroying stages, musical instruments and facilities in general after the artist refused to perform 'narcocorridos.'
On 12 April 2025, in Heroica Puebla de Zaragoza, Puebla, there was a clash between merchants at the San Isidro market. Some rioters used gunshots. There were no casualties.
On 11 April 2025, in Xalapa-Enriquez, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, neighbors captured and beat a man accused of theft and tied him to a pole in Colonia Sahon and beat him. Police officers arrived and arrested the man.
On 11 April 2025, in Ciudad de Mexico - Coyoacan, students of the National Autonomous University of Mexico (UNAM) demonstrated and marched to Rector's office to demand the removal of the university tribunal which establish the immediate suspension or expulsion of students who engage in acts of vandalism. A group of hooded students vandalized street furniture and looted convenience stores and a pharmacy.
On 10 April 2025, in El Pueblito, Michoacan de Ocampo, residents attacked two officers of the State Attorney General's Office who arrived in the community to seize avocado orchards and beat both officers. The officers were released upon negotiations. While leaving, the officers were involved in an accident injuring two civilians.
On 10 April 2025, in Arantepacua, Michoacan de Ocampo, students of the Cheran teacher training school and residents demonstrated to demand the release of four students who were arrested the day before during a clash with police officers (coded separately). The students set fire to a food truck. The same day, eight of the 12 student teachers were released.
On 10 April 2025, in San Francisco Pichataro, Michoacan de Ocampo, normal rural students set up a blockade and set fire to tires on the Patzcuaro-Uruapan highway to demand the release of student teachers who were arrested the day before during a demonstration (coded separately).
On 9 April 2025, in Morelia, Michoacan de Ocampo, normal rural students demonstrated to demand better school conditions and attacked police officers of the Public Order Restoration Group (AROP) with stones and fireworks when they attempted to intervene. Students also set fire to a school vehicle. Officers arrested 12 students as a result. Another blockade was reported near Tiripetio which took place hours before.
On 9 April 2025, near Tiripetio, Michoacan de Ocampo, normal rural students demonstrated and blocked transportation routes at KM 25 on the Morelia-Patzcuaro highway to demand better conditions for schools and set fire to a van.
On 9 April 2025, in Chalco de Diaz Covarrubias, Mexico, tens of people held a demonstration to demand for the search of a woman who went missing. The demonstrators blocked the Mexico-Puebla highway with burning tyres.
On 8 April 2025, in Heroica Puebla de Zaragoza, Puebla, five men beaten up a journalist after he was trying to record an incident with a driver in the historic center.
On 7 April 2025, in Xochitlan, Hidalgo, nearly 100 residents detained and beat two people they accused of robbing a local elementary school.
On 7 April 2025, in Torreon, Coahuila de Zaragoza, residents of an irregular neighborhood armed with machetes attacked a group of municipal police officers when they arrived to evict them from the area in Ejido Nuevo Mieleras. During the clash an officer shot and killed a man. According to the demonstrators, the officers attacked them. After the incident, the officer who shot was arrested. 1 fatality.
On 7 April 2025, in Tehuacan, Puebla, over 2,000 members of the National Coordinator of Artisans and Merchants demonstrated in front of a Coppel store on Adolfo Lopez Mateos street and blocked Cuacnopalan-Oaxaca and 150 federal Mexico-Veracruz roads to demand the return of 261,000 pesos that supposedly disappeared from a woman's bank account and she denied to have spent. During the demonstration, some individuals knocked down the store's security cameras, beat and injured a security guard, and broke the glass of the main entrance. 1 injured.
On 7 April 2025, in the municipality of Teteles de Avila Castillo, Puebla, normalista students of Carmen Serdan school blocked 5 de Mayo boulevard by San Francisco, where they burned a mattress and vandalized a bus (methods unknown) to demand the state authorities to deliver financial resources pending since February 2025, which are needed for the maintenance of the institution and its students.
On 7 April 2025, in San Martin Texmelucan de Labastida, Puebla, around 30 residents of the community of San Lucas El Grande in San Salvador El Verde burned tires and used them to block Mexico-Puebla highway to demand that the authorities immediately transfer a man who had suffered a motorcycle accident near Chautla and was being treated at El Moral Integral Hospital. His relatives considered that the patient required equipment and doctors that were not available at that hospital.
On 6 April 2025, in San Juan Bautista Coixtlahuaca, Oaxaca, resident demonstrated and accused the mayor of lack of transparency in the management of the 2023-2024 resources. The participants detained the mayor and an unspecified number of members of his administration after a general assembly. On 8 April they were released.
On 6 April 2025, in Ejido San Francisco Chimalpa, Mexico, residents blocked Naucalpan-Toluca road to demand the authorities to find three girls who disappeared. One of the girls was located during the demonstration, after which state police officers demanded the demonstrators to end the blockade. Some of the demonstrators then beat the officers and set one of their vehicles on fire. Unspecified number of injured.
Around 6 April 2025 (as reported), in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, members of The Voice of the Users demonstrated against the increase of public transport fares at Crowne Plaza Hotel, during the Second State Convention of the Citizens' Movement party. The demonstrators engaged in pushing and hitting among each other under unknown circumstances.
Around 5 April 2025 (as reported), in Zapoapan, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, residents beat and injured a telephone company employee whom they accused of planning to commit robberies or kidnapping children in the area when they got him out of the vehicle and found seven telephones and a signal inhibitor on him. Municipal and state police officers arrived at the scene and arrested the man, who was later released due to lack of evidences. 1 injured.
On 5 April 2025, in San Juan Tuxco, Puebla, at least 50 people beat and injured a man for suspectedly sexually assaulting a woman. State police officers arrived at the scene and arrested the man. 1 injured.
On 5 April 2025, in San Buenaventura, Tlaxcala, residents and local vendors beat and injured a man and tied him to a pole for suspectedly trying to steal a motorcycle. Municipal and state police officers arrived at the scene, dispersed the inhabitants with tear gas and arrested the man. 1 injured.
On 5 April 2025, in Victoria de Durango, Durango, students occupied the central building of the Juarez University of the State of Durango (UJED) during two days and threw stones that broke the windows and damaged furniture and the premises to demonstrate against the results of the elections for the presidency of the Federation of University Students of Durango (FEUD), which were announced the day before.
On 4 April 2025, in Ciudad de Mexico - Cuauhtemoc, a group of vendors beat, detained and threatened to lynch two journalists (a man and a woman) while they documented the existence of a camera in the women's restrooms of San Rafael square, on San Cosme avenue, in Colonia San Rafael. Police officers arrived at the scene and protected the journalists. An alternative version indicated that the aggression began when a woman beat the journalists for suspectedly recording her daughter. 2 injured.
On 4 April 2025, in Ciudad de San Pablo del Monte, Tlaxcala, resident of the neighborhood of Tlaltepango beat and injured a boy who had suspectedly sexually harassed and attempted to abduct two girls. The boy's father arrived at the scene and was also beat, while his van was set on fire. Military officers arrived at the scene and rescued both men. During the incident, a woman was injured under unknown circumstances. 3 injured.
On 4 April 2025, in Monterrey, Nuevo Leon, around 70 members of the organization The Voice of the Users marched along and blocked Pino Suarez avenue, Washington street by La Alameda, Padre Mier, Constitucion avenue, Colon avenue and the intersection of Cuauhtemoc and Hidalgo avenues to demonstrate against the increase in public transport fares. Some of the demonstrators were hooded and entered Fundadores metro station, where they painted and scratched the walls and furniture, blocked the payment machines, and told people to enter without paying. Metro security guards attempted to stop them with unknown methods. The demonstrators then travelled to Cuauhtemoc station, where they replicated the previous actions.
On 3 April 2025, in Cuautla, Morelos, a man was held and beaten up by merchants after he was accused of robbing people around the city center.
Around 2 April 2025 (as reported), in San Francisco de Campeche, Campeche, five individuals beat and injured a man in Colonia 5 de Mayo for unknown reasons. 1 injured.
On 2 April 2025, in Tangancicuaro de Arista, Michoacan de Ocampo, tens of residents looted and burned trucks, vans, and cars, including a car of the state police, and used them to block Jacona-Zamora road in Fraccionamiento Manantiales del Curutaran to demand the Civil Guard to leave the area. During the demonstration, the rioters beat and threw sticks and stones at state police officers, injuring some of them. The demonstrators denounced that the officers hit a citizen and stole 30,000 pesos from him the day before (coded separately). Some injured.
On 1 April 2025, in San Miguel Xochitecatitla, Tlaxcala, around 200 residents tied a man to a pole, undressed and lynched him, and burned his genitals. The man was one of the two men who had abducted and sexually assaulted a girl earlier the same day. The rioters blocked the accesses to the town to prevent police officers from rescuing the man. The other man fled and was not located. 1 fatality.
Around 1 April 2025 (as reported), in Ecatepec de Morelos, Mexico, residents hit and injured a man who had assaulted a grocery store and threatened her owner with a knife in Colonia Emiliano Zapata. Municipal police officers arrived at the scene and arrested the man. 1 injured.
On 1 April 2025, in Tiripetio, Michoacan de Ocampo, for the second consecutive day, normalista students of Teneria school, in Lazaro Cardenas del Rio, demonstrated on km. 24 of Morelia-Patzcuaro road to demand to be taken into consideration in the election of their school's directors, after the previous directors were dismissed on 14 March 2025. The demonstrators attempted to loot vehicles, which was prevented by police officers who intervened with unknown methods. The demonstrators then threw stones and fireworks at the police, causing burns to one of them. 1 injured.

In April 2025, Mexico experienced a significant number of violent incidents targeting civilians, with notable clusters in states like Sinaloa, Guerrero, and Guanajuato. Key events include:

- **Sinaloa**: Multiple high-fatality incidents occurred, such as the attack on a rehabilitation center in Culiacan Rosales, where nine individuals were killed (MEX102349). Another incident involved the killing of two truck drivers whose bodies were found with signs of torture (MEX103367).

- **Guerrero**: Several violent attacks were reported, including the killing of a taxi driver and a passenger in Acapulco de Juarez (MEX103013). Another incident involved the murder of a family in Cuajinicuilapa (MEX103027).

- **Guanajuato**: Multiple drive-by shootings and targeted killings were reported, such as the killing of four men in a football field in Cardenas (MEX102730) and the murder of a man in Leon de los Aldama (MEX102996).

- **Baja California**: Several incidents of violence were reported, including the killing of a man in Tijuana (MEX102696) and an attack on a rehabilitation center in Culiacan Rosales (MEX102349).

- **Jalisco**: Incidents included the killing of a municipal police officer in Teocaltiche (MEX102365) and the murder of a woman activist and her son in Santa Cruz del Valle (MEX103044).

- **Mexico City**: Several violent incidents were reported, including the killing of a man in Tlalpan (MEX102366) and the murder of a woman in Azcapotzalco (MEX103373).

- **Veracruz**: Notable incidents included the killing of a man in Papantla de Olarte (MEX103228) and the murder of a woman in Coatzacoalcos (MEX102432).

- **Other States**: Incidents were also reported in states like Nuevo Leon, Michoacan, and Puebla, with various drive-by shootings, targeted killings, and attacks on public figures.

Overall, the month saw a high level of violence, with numerous fatalities and injuries, highlighting the ongoing security challenges in Mexico.

On 30 April 2025, in Temixco, Morelos, armed individuals intercepted a vehicle and shot and killed a couple. One of the victims was a former federal police officer who was a survivor of an attack of a military helicopter by the Jalisco New Generation Cartel (CJNG) in 2015. The helicopter was shot down by during an operation to capture Nemesio Oseguera Cervantes, alias 'El Mencho.' 2 fatalities.
On 30 April 2025, in Nacajuca, Tabasco, unidentified armed individuals on motorcycles shot and killed at the technical secretary of the city council when he was out of his house in his car in Taxco ranch. He was also a lawyer and the director of a public school. 1 fatality.
Around 30 April 2025 (as reported), in Playas de Rosarito, Baja California, a woman was killed and her body was found wrapped in plastic in colonia Villa Bonita. 1 fatality.
Around 30 April 2025 (as reported), in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in a blanket with a tourniquet in colonia La Garita. 1 fatality.
On 30 April 2025, in Guadalupe, Nuevo Leon, two armed men entered a house and shot and killed a family, including the father, mother and their son in colonia Benito Juarez. Two men were arrested. 3 fatalities.
Around 30 April 2025 (as reported), in Valtierrilla, Guanajuato, five people, including four men and a woman were killed and their bodies were found with gunshot wounds inside a vehicle on the Salamanca-Celaya highway. 5 fatalities.
Around 30 April 2025 (as reported), in Fuentezuelas, Queretaro, a municipal worker from the Municipal Drinking Water and Sewerage Board of San Juan del Rio was killed and his body was found with his hands tied up and gagged. He was reported missing since 27 April after only his vehicle was found. 1 fatality.
On 30 April 2025, in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, two armed men on a motorcycle shot and killed a man who was working as an air conditioning technician in colonia Progreso (drive-by). 1 fatality.
Around 30 April 2025 (as reported), in Hoyicazuela, Michoacan, a man was killed and his body was found beaten up and burned. 1 fatality.
Around 30 April 2025 (as reported), in Costa Rica, Sinaloa, a person was killed and the body was found wrapped in a blanket and tied with tape on the Culiacan-Eldorado highway. 1 fatality.
Around 30 April 2025 (as reported), in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, two men were killed and their bodies were found with their hands and feet tied up, wrapped with a blanket and a message in colonia Piletas I y II. 2 fatalities.
Around 30 April 2025 (as reported), in San Luis Mextepec, Mexico, a man and a woman were killed and their bodies were found inside a house. The man had his torso and head burned. The woman was found with signs of violence. 2 fatalities.
Around 30 April 2025 (as reported), in Lazaro Cardenas, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, a man was killed and the body was found naked, with gunshot wounds and with his throat slit in sugarcane fields. 1 fatality.
On 30 April 2025, in Jaltipan de Morelos, Veracruz, at least three armed men kidnapped a sports promoter and member of the National Regeneration Movement (MORENA) after they entered his house. The victim was part of the campaign team for the Labor Party candidate. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.
On 30 April 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, several armed individuals kidnapped a woman in colonia Montebello. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.
On 30 April 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, several armed men in several vehicles shot at a house in colonias 5 de Febrero y Amistad (drive-by). Three men were injured. The place is known to be a gamer place. Later, two victims died. 2 fatalities.
On 29 April 2025, in Villa Benito Juarez, Sinaloa, unidentified armed individuals kidnapped three men and a woman. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.
On 29 April 2025, in Nuxco, Guerrero, according to witnesses, armed individuals who arrived in vehicles shot and killed at a mango business producer when he was working. 1 fatality.
On 29 April 2025, around Xalapa-Enriquez, Veracruz, armed individuals shot and injured at the Secretary of the city council of Paso de Ovejas when he was travelling on the Veracruz-Xalapa highway. The victim is collaborating in the electoral campaign of the Morena-PVEM candidate to mayor of Paso de Ovejas.
On 29 April 2025, in Tijuana, Baja California, two armed men shot and injured a man who is a practitioner of Santeria when he was in his business place around the San Jorge mall.
On 29 April 2025, around La Ruana, Michoacan, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a driver from the digital platform Uber on the Mexico-Guadalajara. The perpetrators set his vehicle on fire. Before the victim died, he called his relatives and colleagues to ask for help and describe the facts. 1 fatality.
On 29 April 2025, in Arenal, Veracruz, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed the candidate from the Morena party to the municipal presidency in Coxquihui municipality inside his campaign house. Another three people were also injured. On this day, the candidate would have started his campaign. According to local media, an unknown number of other people were killed and at least ten people were injured. During previous days, some people made accusations against the candidate for being involved in a couple of homicides that occurred in the area, however, this was not confirmed. At least 1 fatality.
On 29 April 2025, in Ocuiltzapotlan, Tabasco, several armed individuals shot and injured at the coordinator of the state police when he was going out of his work (likely off-duty) in fraccionamiento Las Rosas.
On 29 April 2025, in Ciudad de Mexico - Azcapotzalco, two armed individuals shot at a group of men outside on the street in Colonia Liberacion. One man died and three were injured as a result. 1 fatality, 3 injuries.
On 29 April 2025, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, two armed men shot and injured a man outside his house in colonia El Observatorio II. Also in Leon, two armed men entered a mechanic shop and shot and injured a man in colonia John F. Kennedy. 1 fatality.
Around 29 April 2025 (as reported), in Chilpancingo de los Bravo, Guerrero, a man was killed and his body was found covered with a plastic near the area known as Tierras Prietas. 1 fatality.
Around 29 April 2025 (as reported), in Ciudad Serdan, Puebla, a man was killed and his body was found beaten up, and wrapped up with a blanket and a tape on the road to San Pedro Temamatla in El Veladero community. 1 fatality.
Around 29 April 2025 (as reported), in Cancun, Quintana Roo, a man was killed and his body was found with signs of torture and wrapped in a blanket inside a plastic bag in region 226. 1 fatality.
On 29 April 2025, in Monterrey, Nuevo Leon, according to witnesses, armed individuals shot and killed two men in ciudad Solidaridad. 2 fatalities.
Around 29 April 2025 (as reported), in Tlajomulco de Zuniga, Jalisco, a woman was killed and her body was found with the 'tiro de gracia' in fraccionamiento Lomas de Tejeda. 1 fatality.
Around 29 April 2025 (as reported), in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, a man was killed and his body was found dismembered covered with plastic in colonia Canada del Real. 1 fatality.
Around 29 April 2025 (as reported), in Benito Juarez, Nuevo Leon, a man was killed and his body was found with a message signed by a criminal group in colonia Privadas del Bosque. The victim was involved in the killing of a woman and his baby. 1 fatality.
On 29 April 2025, in Cadereyta Jimenez, Nuevo Leon, according to witnesses, armed individuals travelling in two vehicles shot and killed two women and a man in 'El Agarron'. It is suspected to be a settling of accounts related to drug dealing, however, this was not confirmed. The event occurred near a house known as a drug dealing point. 3 fatalities.
Around 29 April 2025 (as reported), in Lazaro Cardenas, Veracruz, a man was killed and his body was found naked, with signs of torture and beheaded. 1 fatality.
On 29 April 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found burned inside the trunk of a vehicle in colonia Juntas de Humaya. The victim had disappeared from colonia Nuevo Culiacan earlier the same day. 1 fatality.
Around 28 April 2025 (as reported), in San Luis Potosi, San Luis Potosi, several individuals suspectedly abducted a man. The victim, who was found with the torso naked, managed to escape and called for help while he was being chased by at least one perpetrator in colonia Emiliano Zapata.
On 28 April 2025, in Ciudad Obregon, Sonora, according to witnesses, armed individuals entered a house and kidnapped a man in fraccionamiento Real del Bosque. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.
On 28 April 2025, in Tlapacoyan, Veracruz, a person was kidnapped by individuals from a criminal group. The perpetrators asked for a ransom. The victim was later rescued and released during a police operation that led to an armed clash (coded separately).
On 28 April 2025, in Cochoapa el Grande, Guerrero, members of Los Ardillos Gang shot and killed a little boy, who was coming back from selling sodas, and a man on the Arroyo Prieto-Joya Real intersection around Tlacoachistlahuaca highway. The victims were parts of the Na Savi group (Mixtec Indigenous group). The perpetrators stopped them in the middle of the road and asked for money from their sells, when they denied they were killed. 2 fatalities.
Around 28 April 2025 (as reported), in Celaya, Guanajuato, two men on a motorcycle arrived at the premises of Chacmool water purifier company, on Camino a San Jose de Guanajuato street, and shot and killed an employee. 1 fatality.
On 28 April 2025, in Navolato, Sinaloa, according to witnesses, several individuals shot and killed a (likely off-duty) municipal police commander outside his house on Ignacio Hion street, in colonia La Arrocera. An alternative version indicated that it was on Ramon Ross street. 1 fatality.
On 28 April 2025, in Ciudad de Mexico - Cuauhtemoc, according to witnesses, three men shot and injured a man on Doctor Jose Maria Vertiz avenue, in colonia Doctores. 1 injured.
On 28 April 2025, in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, according to witnesses, unidentified individuals shot and killed a man in the intersection of 18 de Marzo and Ricardo Flores Magon streets, in colonia Progreso. 1 fatality.
Around 28 April 2025 (month of), in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, a man was killed and his body was found in state of decomposition, signs of torture, semi buried and covered by plastic bags on Chorrito avenue, near El Veladero National Park. 1 fatality.
Around 28 April 2025 (as reported), in Ecatepec de Morelos, Mexico, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in plastic bags in Colonia Santa Maria Chiconautla. 1 fatality.
On 28 April 2025, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, men on a motorcycle chased and shot at a man on Cerro Pintado street. The victim sought refuge in a grocery store in the intersection of Navarra street, in colonia Piletas III, where the perpetrators killed him. An unconfirmed version indicated that the victim suspectedly was a thief, although it is unknown whether this was linked to the attack. Also in Leon de los Aldama, two men suspectedly shot and injured a man in colonia Canadas del Real. Both perpetrators were arrested. And in colonia La Lomita, at least two men entered house in the intersection of Loma Mirador and Loma Alta streets and shot at two men, killing one and injuring the other. 2 fatalities, 2 injured.
On 28 April 2025, in Tijuana, Baja California, according to witnesses, armed individuals in two vehicles shot and killed (drive-by) at a man and his wife in fraccionamiento Lomas del Refugio (drive-by). The man was a former head of the Tijuana Federal Police station and was also the owner of Gruas Arredondo (crane company), a Tecate-based company which had contracts with the federal government for towing vehicles that have been implicated in crimes. One man was arrested and drugs were seized. 2 fatalities.
On 28 April 2025, in Amatlan de los Reyes Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, an unidentified individual shot and killed the municipal Director of Economic Development. 1 fatality.
On 28 April 2025, in Teocaltiche, Jalisco, according to witnesses, between one and two individuals got off a motorcycle and shot and killed the Municipal Government Secretary General who was at El Ranger seafood restaurant on Moctezuma Sur street, in colonia Tavares de Teocaltiche or Centro. The victim also was the municipal leader of the PRI party and former president of the PRI Municipal Steering Committee. According to witnesses, state police officer who were in the area did not intervene. 1 fatality.
On 28 April 2025, in San Marcos, Hidalgo, according to witnesses, individuals in two vehicles chased and shot and killed at a man driving another vehicle on Tula-San Pedro Alpuyeca road by Escorpion Motel, in colonia El Carmen (drive-by). 1 fatality.
Around 28 April 2025 (as reported), in Tonala, Jalisco, an individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in the intersection of Loma Dorada Sur and Rio Nilo streets, in colonia Loma Dorada (drive-by). 1 fatality.
Around 28 April 2025 (as reported), in Buenavista Tomatlan, Michoacan de Ocampo, a man was killed and his body was found with signs of torture, a gunshot wound in the head (likely 'tiro de gracia') and burns in the legs and hands in the intersection of Amapola and 6 de Junio streets, in colonia Arcos. 1 fatality.
On 28 April 2025, in Guadalupe, Nuevo Leon, two armed individuals shot and killed a man inside a house in Colonia Nuevo Almaguer. The house was known as a drug dealing point. 1 fatality.
Around 28 April 2025 (as reported), in Mazatlan, Sinaloa, individuals on a motorcycle shot at two men in fraccionamiento Santa Teresa (drive-by). One of them died and the other was injured. 1 fatality, 1 injured.
On 27 April 2025, in Morelia, Michoacan de Ocampo, at least three hooded individuals who were wearing tactical vests shot and injured a man on Mar de Cortes street, in Colonia Presa de los Reyes. 1 injured.
On 27 April 2025, in Ciudad de Mexico - Azcapotzalco, according to witnesses, individuals who arrived on a motorcycle approached a boy in the intersection of 12 and 17 streets, in Colonia Prohogar, and one of them shot and killed him. 1 fatality.
Around 27 April 2025 (as reported), in Ciudad de Mexico - Azcapotzalco, according to witnesses, two men on a motorcycle approached a man and a girl who were on a motorcycle on Chilapilla street, in colonia San Antonio and shot at them. The man died and the girl was injured. 1 fatality, 1 injured.
On 27 April 2025, in Cuautepec de Hinojosa, Hidalgo, according to witnesses, unidentified individuals paired their vehicle with a man's van in La Trinidad and shot and killed him (drive-by). 1 fatality.
On 27 April 2025, in San Francisco Coacalco, Mexico, two individuals on a motorcycle blocked the way to a man who was driving on De los Trabajadores avenue, in colonia San Lorenzo Tetlixtac, and one of them shot and killed him. An alternative version indicated that it was on Jose Lopez Bonaga avenue. 1 fatality.
On 27 April 2025, in Benito Juarez, Nuevo Leon, two individuals on a motorcycle shot at a taxi on Rio Papigochi street, in colonia Los Puertos (drive-by). The taxi driver's wife and child were in the vehicle. The driver tried to evade the perpetrators, but they chased them until the taxi stopped in the intersection of Rio Omotepec and Rio Concepcion streets, where they killed the woman and the child and injured the man. The authorities searched the vehicle and found marijuana. 2 fatalities, 1 injured.
On 27 April 2025, in Ciudad de Mexico - Tlahuac, the driver of a van shot and killed two women who were driving in the intersection of Salvador Diaz Miron street and San Rafael Atlixco avenue, in colonia Santa Ana Poniente (drive-by). 2 fatalities.
Around 27 April 2025 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a person was attacked and a dismembered hand was found inside a garbage container in the intersection of Acueducto and Pirules avenues, in colonia Ojo de Agua.
Around 27 April 2025 (as reported), in Malinalco, Mexico, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in a sheet, with the feet and hands tied and along with a cardboard with an unspecified message on Zumpahuacan-San Andres de Nicolas Bravo road. 1 fatality.
On 27 April 2025, in Ciudad Apodaca, Nuevo Leon, two men chased and shot and killed a man in an Oxxo store in the intersection of Bugambillas street and Las Palmas avenue, in colonia Valle de las Palmas. The attack suspectedly responded to a dispute over drug trafficking. 1 fatality.
On 27 April 2025, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, two men shot at three men outside a grocery store in the intersection of Canada del Madrono and Canada de las Flores, in Colonia Canada del Real, suspectedly due to a dispute over drug trafficking. The three men died. Both perpetrators were arrested. 3 fatalities.
On 26 April 2025, in Chilpancingo de los Bravo, Guerrero, unidentified men entered La Martina bar on Lazaro Cardenas avenue and shot and killed the owner and a client. Another man and a woman were injured. It is likely that there were witnesses, since the bar was reported to be full. An armed clash had previously taken place in the same bar on 19 January 2024 (coded separately). 2 fatalities, 2 injured.
Around 26 April 2025 (as reported), in Cruz Blanca Numero 1, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, according to residents, unidentified individuals shot at a house and injured a woman. 1 injured.
Around 26 April 2025 (between 26 - 27 April), near La Marquesa, Mexico, four men shot at a vehicle on Mexico-Toluca federal road near La Marquesa toll. Four suspects were arrested. Casualties unknown.
Around 26 April 2025 (as reported), in El Salto, Jalisco, a man was killed and his body was found with gunshot wounds and wrapped in a blanket on Jesus Romo street, in Colonia Potrero Nuevo. An alternative version indicated that the victim was found in a field around the area known as Laurel, near Jesus Romo street, in colonia La Coladera. 1 fatality.
On 26 April 2025, in Atlatlahucan, Morelos, according to witnesses, hooded individuals entered a house in the intersection of Kilometro 88 avenue and 25 de Mayo street, in the neighborhood of Los Reyes, and shot and killed a man in front of his wife. The victim suspectedly was the nephew of the municipal Secretary of Public Safety and worked collecting extortion fees. 1 fatality.
Around 26 April 2025 (month of), in Pesqueria, Nuevo Leon, a man was killed and his body was found in an advanced state of decomposition and with a cable around the neck in an abandoned field near Modena and Montedoro streets, in colonia Valle de Santa Maria. 1 fatality.
On 26 April 2025, in Tijuana, Baja California, according to witnesses, two men shot at three men in a house on 21 street, in colonia Libertad. Two men died and another was injured. The perpetrators were arrested. 2 fatalities, 1 injured.
On 26 April 2025, in Villa de Zaachila, Oaxaca, according to witnesses, unidentified men shot and killed two men who travelled in a van on 131 state road by colonia Olimpo. 2 fatalities.
On 26 April 2025, in Nicolas Bravo, Tabasco, individuals who arrived in two vehicles entered a house and shot at a woman and her grandchild. The woman died and the child were injured. The perpetrators left a cardboard with an unspecified message addressed to rival groups. 1 fatality, 1 injured.
On 26 April 2025, in Ciudad General Escobedo, Nuevo Leon, men in a van shot and injured a man and a woman in the intersection of Circuito de la Luz and Tercer Andador de la Luz streets, in colonia Infonavit Monterreal (drive-by). 2 injured.
On 26 April 2025, in Ciudad de Mexico - Venustiano Carranza, four people entered a house on Miguel Dominguez street, in colonia Penitenciaria where members of a family were celebrating a baby shower and shot at them. On 26 April 2025, in Colima, Colima, individuals on two motorcycles shot and killed a man on the road to Tepames (drive-by). Another man was collaterally injured. 1 fatality, 1 injured.
On 26 April 2025, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, two men on a motorcycle shot and killed a man on Cloto boulevard, in Colonia La Ermita (drive-by). The victim's partner was at the scene and remained uninjured. Also in Leon de los Aldama, two men on a motorcycle shot and injured two men who were driving in the intersection of Champagne and Amaretto streets, in Colonia Real de Jerez (drive-by). A man was arrested. 1 fatality, 2 injured.
Around 26 April 2025 (as reported), in the municipality of Cuajinicuilapa, Guerrero, a man was killed and his body was found beheaded and with the feet tied with chains on Acapulco-Pinotepa Nacional federal road by the junction to El Terrero. The head was next to the body, which had the torso naked. The body was suspectedly thrown from a moving vehicle. 1 fatality.
Around 26 April 2025 (as reported), in Zapopan, Jalisco, a man was killed and his body was found with the hands and feet tied and burns in the arms and the head. The victim was in a vehicle in the intersection of 21 de Marzo and San Juan de los Lagos streets, in colonia Hogares de Nuevo Mexico. 1 fatality.
Around 26 April 2025 (as reported), in El Fuerte, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found with gunshot wounds and the hands handcuffed next to Tetaroba-El Fuerte road. Next to the body, there was a cardboard with an unspecified message. 1 fatality.
Around 26 April 2025 (as reported), in Fresnillo, Zacatecas, a person was killed and the dismembered body was found in several plastic bags on Plazuela Maravillas street, in Colonia Barrio de Maravillas. 1 fatality.
Around 26 April 2025 (as reported), in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, a man was killed and his body was found in plastic bags and next to a cardboard with an unspecified message in the intersection of Jose Antonio Martir and Gervacio streets, in Colonia Ampliacion Libertadores. Also in Acapulco, a man was killed and his body was found with the hands and feet tied, a tourniquet around the neck, signs of torture and wrapped in a sheet on Las Plazuelas avenue and the bridge over La Sabana river, in Colonia Alborada. On 26 April 2025, in Melchor Ocampo, Mexico, at least four individuals on two motorcycles shot at five people who were in a vehicle on Centenario Himno Nacional avenue, in Colonia Visitacion (drive-by). Two men and a woman died, and a man and a woman were injured. 3 fatalities, 2 injured.
On 26 April 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, according to witnesses, between two and three armed individuals abducted a man at the zoo. The victim's wife was at the scene and remained uninjured. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.
Around 25 April 2025 (as reported), in Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur, a person was killed and the body was found with signs of torture. 1 fatality.
On 25 April 2025, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, A woman was shot dead by an armed man inside a grocery store in Colonia San Vicente. The victim, who was the owner of the store, was shot in front of her son and a customer. The perpetrator fled on a motorcycle along with an accomplice. 1 fatality.
On 25 April 2025, in San Pedro Cholula, Mexico, according to witnesses, armed individuals shot and killed a man in Colonia Forjadores. The victim was left with the 'tiro de gracia'. 1 fatality.
Around 25 April 2025 (as reported), near Plan de San Luis, Sinaloa, a man was killed and the body was found with his hands tied up and gunshot wounds. 1 fatality.
On 25 April 2025, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, two armed men on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in a drive-by in colonia San Marcos. Also in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, two men on a motorcycle shot and injured a man in a drive-by on Brisas de Lanus street, in colonia Brisas del Campestre. 1 fatality, 1 injured.
Around 25 April 2025 (as reported), in Tlajomulco de Zuniga, Jalisco, a man was killed and his body was found without arms and burned on the road to La Canada, in colonia La Providencia. 1 fatality.
On 25 April 2025, in Soledad de Graciano Sanchez, San Luis Potosi, according to a video posted on social media, three men abducted a woman in fraccionamiento Campo Bello. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.
On 25 April 2025, in Tijuana, Baja California, according to one of the victims, two men shot at a boy and a girl on Rogelio Lavenant street, in colonia Camino Verde. The boy died and the girl remained uninjured. During their escape, the perpetrators ran over and injured a woman who was not linked to the attack. A man was arrested. 1 fatality, 1 injured.
Around 25 April 2025 (as reported), in Metepec, Mexico, a man was killed and his body was found with signs of blows in the head and covered by blankets in a parking lot on Rancho Seco street, in colonia Infonavit San Francisco. 1 fatality.
On 25 April 2025, in San Baltazar Temaxcalac, Puebla, according to witnesses, several individuals entered a tacos restaurant on Oaxaca street and shot and killed the owner's son. A woman was collaterally injured. 1 fatality, 1 injured.
Around 25 April 2025 (between 24 - 27 April), near Estacion Retes, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found with the hands tied, gunshot wounds and a bag or blanket covering his head on the path that connects Estacion Retes and Benito Juarez highway. The victim disappeared on 24 April 2025 when he was heading to the community of Jesus Maria, where he intended to deliver medicines. The body was found on 27 April 2025. 1 fatality.
On 25 April 2025, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, two men on a motorcycle shot and injured an employee of a gas station in the intersection of Congreso de Chilpancingo and Antonio Madrazo boulevards, in Colonia Las Trojes (drive-by). 1 injured.
Around 25 April 2025 (between 22 - 28 April), in Heroica Ciudad de Huajuapan de Leon, Oaxaca, a woman was killed and her body was found with signs of torture and gunshot wounds in a suspected criminal safe house in colonia San Isidro Oriente, near Mixteco river. On 25 April 2025, in Sabanas de Xalostoc, Veracruz, armed individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed a man and a woman who were inside a taxi in the area known as El Caracol (drive-by). The woman killed was the daughter of the former treasurer, who was arrested by the Veracruz Attorney General's Office on January 23 for being responsible for a killing in Puebla. 2 fatalities.
On 25 April 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed individuals in a vehicle shot and injured a man in a drive-by while driving in colonia Montebello.
Around 24 April 2025 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a person was killed and the body was found wrapped in plastic with tape in colonia Aguaje de la Tuna. 1 fatality.
On 24 April 2025, in Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur, armed individuals set on fire three vehicles from the public transport in different parts of the city with people inside. There were no casualties. This later led to an armed clash with the authorities (coded separately). The event is likely related to a series of violent events involving Los Mayitos Gang that took place in the state during the week (coded separately).
Around 24 April 2025 (as reported), in Manzanillo, Colima, an unknown number of people were killed and the human remains were found inside four bags in colonia Abelard. Unspecified number of fatalities coded as 3.
On 24 April 2025, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, two armed men on bicycles shot and injured a man in la colonia El Granjeno Sur.
On 24 April 2025, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, two armed men shot and killed a construction worker while working in colonia Ciudad Satelite. 1 fatality.
Around 24 April 2025 (as reported), in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, a man was killed and only the torso was found naked in colonia La Laja. 1 fatality.
On 24 April 2025, in El Carrizo, Guerrero, a group of armed individuals shot and killed two men outside the Dos Potrillos ranch. One of the victims was the father of the mayor of Azoyu. The mayor's was re-elected for the 2024-2027 period. Two men were arrested. 2 fatalities.
Around 24 April 2025 (as reported), around Canada Morelos, Puebla, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in blankets on the road to San Jose Ixtapa. It is suspected that the event could be related to a settling of accounts by criminal members, however, this was not confirmed. 1 fatality.
Around 24 April 2025 (as reported), in Ciudad Obregon, Sonora, a man was killed and the body was found with his hands and feet tied up in colonia Primero de Mayo. 1 fatality.
On 24 April 2025, in Maltrata, Veracruz, armed individuals entered a house and killed three men in Colonia Centro. The victims are relatives of the mayor, including a son and a nephew. The house is the mayor's property. 3 fatalities.
On 24 April 2025, in Poza Rica de Hidalgo, Veracruz, armed individuals shot at a vehicle in Colonia Prensa Nacional. It is suspected that a person was injured by a stray bullet. According to local media, a local journalist was nearby, but according to the police, the attack was not against him.
On 24 April 2025, in Morelia, Michoacan, according to residents, armed individuals shot and killed four men in a house in Colonia Nicolaitas Ilustres. An alternative version indicated that it was on Manuel G. Ortiz street, in fraccionamiento Goberandor Gildardo Magana. At least two of the victims had their hands tied up to their back. 4 fatalities.
Around 24 April 2025 (between 19 - 24 April), in Chiquimitio, Michoacan, a man was killed and his body was found blindfolded, with his hands tied up, gunshot wounds and in an advanced state of decomposition. The victim was reported missing since 19 April. 1 fatality.
Around 24 April 2025 (as reported), in Zihuatanejo, Guerrero, three men and a woman killed a person. The perpetrators were arrested after clashing with military officers who saw them throwing the body in Colonia Las Huertas (coded separately). 1 fatality.
Around 24 April 2025 (month of), in San Baltazar, Puebla, a man was killed and his body was found in an advanced state of decomposition and wrapped in plastic next to Tecamachalco-Xochitlan Todos Santos state road. According to the authorities, this attack could be a settling of scores between criminal groups. 1 fatality.
On 24 April 2025, in Santa Cruz del Valle, Jalisco, three hooded individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed a mother search activist of Guerreros Buscadores collective and her son in the intersection of Villa Sur 32 and Villa Sur streets, in fraccionamiento Santa Cruz del Valle (drive-by). An initial version indicated that the perpetrators shot and the man and his mother was shot when she tried to protect him, however, authorities said that a direct attack against the woman has not been ruled out. 2 fatalities.
On 24 April 2025, in Ciudad de Mexico - Azcapotzalco, individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed a woman and a boy on 25 street, in colonia Prohogar (drive-by). 2 fatalities.
On 24 April 2025, in Villas del Pedregal, Michoacan de Ocampo, two men and a boy abducted a man from his home. The victim was taken to a house on 8 street, where the perpetrators kept a woman who had been abducted on an unspecified date (coded separately). Municipal police officers arrested the perpetrators and released the victims.

On 10 April 2025, in Izucar de Matamoros, Puebla, two armed individuals on a motorcycle attacked two men traveling on a motorcycle and fled the scene (drive-by). One man died as a result and the other was injured. 1 fatality, 1 injury.
On 10 April 2025, in Champoton, Campeche, a group of men entered a home and shot and killed a couple in Colonia El Hunal. One of the victims is believed to have a history of drugs while the home was identified as a salespoint for drugs. 2 fatalities.
Around 10 April 2025 (as reported), in Tejaro de Los Izquierdo, Michoacan de Ocampo, two people were killed and their bodies were found burned inside a truck on a road between Tejaro de Los Izquierdo and Uruetaro. 2 fatalities.
On 10 April 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, at least four armed individuals traveling in two vehicles kidnapped a man from his home in Colonia Prados del Sur. The man was identified as an agricultural engineer. The whereabouts of the man remain unknown.
Around 10 April 2025 (between 9 April - 11 April), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found with gunshot wounds in Colonia Lazaro Cardenes on 11 April. The victim was identified as the former official of the Culiacan City Council who was kidnapped on 9 April. 1 fatality.
Around 10 April 2025 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in plastic and with a message placed on his body in Barrancos. 1 fatality.
On 9 April 2025, in San Francisco de Campeche, Campeche, a journalist was held and beaten up by the state police. Local reports indicated that he was arrested after he tried to intervene during a police operation against a local driver. However, the official report of his arrest indicates that he was arrested for violating protection orders in favor of the Governor and the Secretary of Citizen Protection and Security, after they filed an appealed to the State Attorney General's Office against him for slander, defamation, and hate crimes. The journalist was general editor of the local newspaper TRIBUNA for more than 40 years. The authorities indicated him, to refrain from issuing negative opinions against the two officials or else would face arrest for up to 36 hours. The journalist had a heart attack after the arrest. He was taken to the hospital.
On 9 April 2025, in Ciudad de Mexico - Cuauhtemoc, two armed individuals shot the driver of the judge of the 6th Criminal Chamber of the Superior Court of Justice of Mexico City in Colonia Doctores and then fled the scene on foot. The judge was not in the vehicle at the time. 1 injury.

On 9 April 2025, in Ciudad Apodaca, Nuevo Leon, two hooded armed individuals arrived on a motorcycle shot and injured a couple in the parking lot of mall in colonia Prados de Santa Rosa. One of the victims is suspected to be a local rapper.

Around 9 April 2025 (as reported), in Ciudad Obregon, Sonora, a person was killed and the body was found wrapped in a blanket and with a narco message next to the body. 1 fatality.

Around 8 April 2025 (as reported), in Coatzacoalcos, Veracruz, a man was killed and only the head was found inside a cooler with a message in fraccionamiento Villas Campestre. According to witnesses, two men left the cooler in the place. 1 fatality.
Around 8 April 2025 (as reported), in Rio Grande, Zacatecas, a man was kidnapped, tortured, and killed by suspected members of a criminal group and his body was found in del rancho 'La Rosita. 1 fatality.

On 7 April 2025, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, two armed men shot and injured a man in Colonia Las Piletas.

On 7 April 2025, in Ciudad Santa Catarina, Nuevo Leon, unidentified men entered a house near the intersection of Santo Tomas and San Jorge streets, in Colonia La Ermita, and shot and killed and a man in front of his wife and daughter (likely witnesses). 1 fatality.

On 7 April 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, unidentified individuals (likely affiliated to a criminal group) entered four rehabilitations centers and abducted an unspecified number of patients. Two of the centers were located on Galileo street, in Fraccionamiento Villa Universidad, one on Socrates street, and one on Schiller street. Another clinic was attacked and the owner of some of the centers was abducted the same day (coded separately). The was of attacks against rehabilitation centers have been linked to the war between factions of the Sinaloa Cartel. It is unknown whether any of the victims were injured. Casualties unknown.
On 7 April 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, according to witnesses, at least three men broke down the doors and entered Shaddai rehabilitation center on Cerro de San Cayetano street, in Fraccionamiento Colinas de San Miguel, where they shot and killed nine men and injured five, including patients, the center's director and an employee. One of the victims was foreign. The perpetrators were suspectedly looking for the center's owner and asked the victims whether they belonged to Los Pelones Cartel before shooting. According to the authorities, the perpetrators were members of Los Chapitos gang who were looking to attack at members of Los Mayos Gang. Another clinic was attacked and the owner of both centers was abducted the same day (coded separately). 9 fatalities, at least 4 injured.
On 7 April 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, individuals who travelled in at least two vehicles entered a tires store in the intersection of De las Torres and Constituyentes Hilario Medina avenues, in Colonia Plutarco Elias Calles, and shot and killed a man. 1 fatality.
Around 7 April 2025 (as reported), in Maneadero, Baja California, a person was killed and the body was found burnt on a path in Cerro de San Carlos. 1 fatality.
On 7 April 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, unidentified individuals (likely affiliated to a criminal group) abducted the owner of Shaddai and Rehabilitate rehabilitation centers and president of A Movement for Sinaloa without Addictions from his house in Fraccionamiento Portalegre. The perpetrators also broke down the house doors, shot at it and stole two vehicles and other unspecified valuables. The victim's wife and children were at the scene and remained uninjured. The two centers owned by the victim were attacked the same day by members of a criminal group (coded separately). Hours later, he was killed and his body was found with signs of violence, handcuffed and with a message, wrapped in plastic the same day between colonia La Costerita and Colonia La Primavera. Another man was also kidnapped. The victims' whereabouts are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 6 April 2025 (as reported), in Coatzacoalcos, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in a sheet and with a gunshot wound in the head (likely 'tiro de gracia') in the intersection of Miguel Angel de Quevedo and Hermenegildo Galeana streets, in Colonia Maria de la Piedad. 1 fatality.
Around 6 April 2025 (as reported), in Sanctorum, Puebla, a man and a woman were killed and their bodies were found wrapped in plastic in separate locations, on Maravillas and San Joaquin streets. On 6 April 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, according to witnesses, individuals in a vehicle threw a man in front of Campestre La Cocinita de Enmedio restaurant, on Francisco I. Around 3 April 2025 (as reported), in Guadalajara, Jalisco, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in a blanket in colonia Unidad Clemente Orozco. 1 fatality.

simple_summary:
### Strategic Developments in Mexico, April 2025

**Narco-laboratories and Drug Seizures:**
- Multiple narco-laboratories were dismantled across various states, including Sinaloa, Hidalgo, and Michoacán. Significant seizures of precursor chemicals and drug production materials were made in these operations (e.g., (30 April 2025, Bacata, Sinaloa), (29 April 2025, Topolobampo, Sinaloa)).
- Large quantities of marijuana and cocaine were seized, including 1.8 tons of cocaine off the coast of Acapulco and 2.4 tons off the coast of Guerrero (19 April 2025).
- Marijuana plantations were destroyed in states like Chihuahua, Durango, and Guerrero, with significant operations leading to the eradication of hundreds of hectares of illicit crops (e.g., (26 April 2025, Chihuahua state)).

**Security Operations and Defusals:**
- Authorities conducted extensive operations to dismantle illegal surveillance systems and roadblocks set by criminal groups. Security cameras were removed in multiple locations, including Quintana Roo and Sinaloa (e.g., (22 April 2025, Benito Juarez, Quintana Roo)).
- Explosive devices and IEDs were defused in several locations, including Sinaloa and Michoacán, highlighting ongoing threats from improvised explosives (e.g., (26 April 2025, El Huajote, Sinaloa)).

**Mass Graves and Human Rights Violations:**
- Mass graves were discovered in Baja California and Sinaloa, containing multiple bodies with signs of torture, indicating ongoing violence and human rights abuses (e.g., (29 April 2025, La Rumorosa, Baja California)).
- Displacement and forced migration were reported in Guerrero and Michoacán due to violent conflicts, affecting hundreds of families (e.g., (13 April 2025, Jaleaca de Catalan, Guerrero)).

**Criminal Activities and Violence:**
- Armed clashes between criminal groups and security forces were reported in several states, including Michoacán, Guanajuato, and Jalisco. These conflicts often resulted in property destruction, injuries, and fatalities (e.g., (23 April 2025, Michoacán de Ocampo)).
- Extortion, kidnapping, and targeted assassinations continued, with incidents reported in various regions, including Sinaloa and Tamaulipas (e.g., (23 April 2025, Culiacán Rosales, Sinaloa)).

**Strategic Implications:**
- The persistent dismantling of narco-laboratories and drug seizures indicate ongoing efforts to disrupt drug trafficking operations.
- The discovery of mass graves and reports of displacement highlight the severe human rights situation and the impact of criminal violence on civilian populations.
- Security operations and defusals of explosive devices underscore the continued threat of violence and the need for sustained law enforcement efforts.
- The strategic importance of these developments lies in their impact on public security, human rights, and the overall stability of affected regions.

However, the president of Mexico denied this version and stated that the events that occurred that day in Michoacan, Guanajuato, and Jalisco were due to a dispute between gangs fighting over territory.

Defusal: On 21 April 2025, in Las Paredes del Ahogado, Michoacan de Ocampo, military forces, Civil Guard police, and National Guard police seized 168 improvised explosives (IEDs) intended to be launched from drones. During the operation, three kilos of aluminum powder and one kilo of potassium chlorate were also seized. In addition, two drone overflights suspected to be operated by a criminal cell were neutralized using unspecified anti-drone systems (technological tools).
